Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham scored a stunning 95th-minute equaliser with a bicycle kick.
Harry Kane scored the early extra-time winner to secure a 2-1 victory for England.
Ivan Schranz scored for Slovakia in the 25th minute.
Phil Foden's goal was disallowed for offside shortly after the break.
Declan Rice hit the post late in the game.
Post-Match Reflections: England fans celebrated Jude Bellingham's late equaliser at Wembley.
England will face Switzerland in the quarterfinals in Duesseldorf on July 6.
England needs to improve their performance against Switzerland, who outplayed defending champions Italy in the last-16.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at VELTINS-Arena in Gelsenkirchen, Germany.
